requestBody.title: Invite and provision business member Snapshot

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Legal Blackout Window. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.

data.title: Invite and provision business member Snapshot
